page_content: Discusses the revised plan for excavation, landfill, and transportation in the Canton of Bern.
Provides information on deductible interest on debts such as mortgage interest in Switzerland.
Discusses compensations not included in the net salary, such as in-kind benefits and tips.
Announces traffic restrictions in Bern due to the 30th Swiss Women's Run.
Discusses how gambling costs are automatically considered in tax assessments in Switzerland.
Discusses the tax deductibility of spousal support payments in Switzerland.
Announces a new database aimed at documenting gender-specific unequal treatment in the workplace.
